org.pathvisio.core.model

Class MPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pathvisio.core.model.MPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, GraphLink.GraphIdContainer, GraphLink.GraphRefContainer

    public class MPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphLink.GraphRefContainer
    This class represents the Line.Graphics.Point element in GPML.

        public boolean isRelative()
        Checks if the position of this point should be stored as relative or absolute coordinates
        Returns:
        true if the coordinates are relative, false if not

      • relativeSet

        protected boolean relativeSet()
        Helper method for converting older GPML files without relative coordinates.
        Returns:
        true if setRelativePosition(double, double) was called to set the relative coordinates, false if not.

      • setGraphRef

        public void setGraphRef(java.lang.String v)
        Set a reference to another object with a graphId. If a parent is set, this will automatically deregister the previously held reference and register the new reference as necessary
        Parameters:
        v - reference to set.
